      • lookupById

        public static Site lookupById(java.lang.Long siteId)
        looks up the site by name. Handles some special cases: for siteId = 0 or siteId = null returns null for invalid siteId values (not found in the DB) also returns null, but also prints an error message
        Parameters:
        siteId -
